paragraphs: I'm MD Sabbir Hosen, a multi-skilled technophile from Bangladesh with a passion for blending logic and creativity. My journey spans Python programming (Django, Kivy), ethical hacking, full-stack web development, digital marketing, graphics design (Photoshop, Illustrator), and video editing (Premiere Pro, After Effects).

I thrive on tackling complex challenges and adapting quickly to new technologies. Efficiency, practicality, and continuous learning are core to my approach. I'm always eager to leverage my diverse skill set to build impactful solutions and contribute to innovative projects.
